item.title: Lerping
item.description: What is Lerping? Lerp, or Linear Interpolation, is a mathematical function in Unity that returns a value between two others at a point on a linear scale. Most commonly itâ€™s used for moving or changing values over a period of time. So when you are doing “Linear Interpolation” you are Linearly inserting a new point between 2 points. Linear Interpolation is inserting a new point between 2 points on a straight line.
